_header: Saint Matthew moves in this manner
_description: Gospel for the Eighteenth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Matheu menes on þis manereWhils ihesus crist welk in þis werld here…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Ne so hardy was none þareþat durst þat day opose him mare
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Accesserunt ad ihesum saducei.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.140-143.
